feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-14T02:28:28.040800Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Cormac McCarthy 去世了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/books/cormac-mccarthy-dead.html</id >; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:28:08.217220Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/books/cormac-mccarthy-dead.html"/ >; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/14/obituaries/00mccarthy_cormac-1-print1/00mccarthy_cormac-1-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px;高度：275 像素；" />;<br />;科马克·麦卡锡 (Cormac McCarthy) 是一位隐居作家，以其关于格格不入和怪诞的黑暗和令人毛骨悚然的小说而闻名，享年 89 岁。他的作品经常以暴力和对人类状况的凄凉观点为特色，赢得了无数奖项并被改编成电影，但也因其自觉的男性气质和缺乏著名的女性角色而招致批评。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cormac-mccarthy-has-died" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36316079" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;麦当劳刚刚发布了一款全新的 Game Boy 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 13T20:28:08.217782Z</updated>; <link href="https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/"/>; <author>; <name>;outime</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=outime</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://retrododo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/ grimaces-birthday-gameboy-game-800x450.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;麦当劳发布了一款名为 Grimace's Birthday 的新 Game Boy Color 游戏，该游戏由 Gumpy Function 使用 GB Studio 开发。游戏涉及在滑板上扮演鬼脸，试图找到他的朋友参加他的生日聚会。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mcdonald-s-just-dropped-a-brand-new-game-boy-game" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316134" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源医院价格数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in -定价/数据/主要/费率</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T21:28:08.218189Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency- in-pricing/data/main/rate"/>; <author>; <name>;alecst</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alecst</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#open-source-hospital-price-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自 2026 年 6 月 7 日起，Autodesk 将不再销售或支持 EAGLE</stitle>; <id>;https://www.autodesk.com/support /technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Autodesk-EAGLE-Announcement-Next-steps-and-FAQ.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T00:28:08.218584Z</更新>; <link href ="https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Autodesk-EAGLE-Announcement-Next-steps-and-FAQ.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ambientenv< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ambientenv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;自 2026 年 6 月 7 日起，Autodesk 将停止销售和支持 EAGLE . Fusion 360 订阅仍将提供对 EAGLE Premium 的访问权限，直到 2026 年 6 月不再支持它。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#effective-june-7-2026-autodesk-will-no -longer-sell-nor-support-eagle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319137" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JupyterLab 4.0</ stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4-0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:28:08.218989Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4-0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178"/>; <author>; <name>;jonbaer</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jonbaer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit: 1200/1*Y3aNGoRED2q0pWjlHmr9wg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 119px;" />;<br />;JupyterLab 4.0 是 Jupyter 开发环境的最新版本，现已在 PyPI 和 conda-forge 上可用。它包括更快的渲染、升级的文本编辑器、新的扩展管理器、改进的文档搜索、UI 和辅助功能改进以及错误修复。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jupyterlab-4-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= “https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315796” target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ZX81 机械键盘</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-13T20:28:08.219368Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard"/>; <author>; <name>;zoenolan</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zoenolan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard/main /images/keyboard-with-custom-keycaps.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于与 Sinclair ZX81 及其现代娱乐产品 ZX81+38 兼容的机械键盘。存储库包含键盘的设计文件、导出版本和图像。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zx81-mechanical-keyboard" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36316311" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Aleister Crowley 和 William Butler Yeats 展开一场神秘的战斗</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openculture.com/2016/10/aleister-crowley-william-butler-yeats-get -into-an-occult-battle.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T01:28:08.219741Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.openculture.com/2016/10/ aleister-crowley-william-butler-yeats-get-into-an-occult-battle.html"/>; <author>; <name>;GloomyBoots</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=GloomyBoots</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn8.openculture.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/09223558/Crowley-Yeats- e1476080295373.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;Aleister Crowley 和 William Butler Yeats 是魔法世界中的死对头，叶芝加入了金色黎明的赫尔墨斯教团，而克劳利创立了泰勒玛宗教。他们的冲突既充满诗意又充满诗意实际上，克劳利因为他的黑魔法而被踢出金色黎明，并试图用他的力量对付叶芝和他的白人魔法师伙伴。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aleister-crowley-and -william-butler-yeats-get-into-an-occult-battle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319691 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="文本">;Lewis Hine 的 20 世纪早期“照片故事”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child -labor-problem-180982355/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T21:28:08.220110Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who -forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem-180982355/"/>; <author>; <name>;cratermoon</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=cratermoon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://th-thumbnailer.cdn-si-edu.com/rL39Jd_skZBVfNEcn2Y62OX_ksE=/fit-in/1072x0/filters :focal(1429x844:1430x845)/https://tf-cmsv2-smithsonianmag-media.s3.amazonaws.com/filer_public/f1/0d/f10dc681-3be7-45bc-9d8e-b7a895d3bb17/screenshot_2023-06-12_at_95133_am。 PNG"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 130px;" />;<br />;刘易斯·威克斯·海因 (Lewis Wickes Hine) 在 20 世纪初拍摄的童工照片帮助倡导了童工法和保护措施，但这个问题今天仍然存在，因为有关违规行为的报道和州立法的回滚合法工作年龄。虽然 Hine 的照片侧重于白人儿童，但当代关于童工违规行为的报道却很少提供图片来配合他们的文字、图表和统计数据。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lewis-hines -early-20th-century-photo-stories" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36317587" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成你的项目< /stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T19:28:08.220505Z</updated>; <link href="https ://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects"/>; <author>; <name>;aarondf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aarondf</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.ctfassets.net/s5uo95nf6njh/7AlDzZ2iGukvOe26kfIgLJ/fe6c6ab58b880503c20f27a3e364b83f/Open_source_staircase__1___1_.jpg?w=1200&f m=jpg" 样式="宽度： 220像素； height: 257px;" />;<br />;自述项目旨在通过承认过程中的困难来鼓励人们完成他们的开源项目。这篇文章讨论了从开始项目的最初兴奋到转变的挑战完成它的不那么迷人的工作，并提供了克服这些障碍的策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#finish-your-projects" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;快速工作比看起来更重要（2015 年）</stitle>; <id>;http://jsomers.net/blog /speed-matters</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T16:28:08.220902Z</updated>; <link href="http://jsomers.net/blog/speed-matters"/>; <author>; <名称>;cal85</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cal85</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http:// jsomers.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Screen-Shot-2015-07-26-at-6.03.14-PM.png" style="width: 220px; height: 316px;" />;<br />;本文提供了有关如何排查和修复网站上的 500 错误的信息，这是 Web 服务器在满足客户端。它涵盖了错误的常见原因，例如文件所有权、权限模式、.htaccess 文件中的冲突行和进程限制等问题，并提供了有关如何在 cPanel 中编辑 .htaccess 文件和文件权限的说明。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#working-quickly-is-more-important-than-it-seems-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312295" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;递归的诅咒：生成数据的训练让模型忘记</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.17493</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T23:28:08.221305Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.17493"/>; <author>; <name>;indus</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=indus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/浏览/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;GPT-2、GPT-3(.5) 和 GPT-4 等大型语言模型 (LLM) 在语言任务中表现出令人印象深刻的性能，但在训练中使用模型生成的内容可能会在生成的模型中造成不可逆转的缺陷，称为模型崩溃，原始内容分布的尾部消失。这种现象在所有学习的生成模型中普遍存在，必须认真对待，以维持从大规模数据中提取的训练的好处网络。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curse-of-recursion-training-on-generated-data-makes-models-forget" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重写 Ruby 解析器</stitle>; <id>;https://railsatscale.com//2023-06- 12-rewriting-the-ruby-parser/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T14:28:08.221699Z</更新>; <link href="https://railsatscale.com//2023-06-12 -rewriting-the-ruby-parser/"/>; <author>; <name>;kddeisz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kddeisz</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://railsatscale.com/2023-06-12-rewriting-the-ruby-parser/error-tolerance.png" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;Shopify 开发了一种名为 YARP 的新 Ruby 解析器，以解决当前 CRuby 解析器长期存在的问题，包括可维护性、容错性、可移植性和性能。YARP 可以解析语义等效的语法在 Shopify 的主代码库、GitHub 的主代码库、CRuby 和从 ruby​​gems.org 下载的 100 个最流行的 gem 中的每个 Ruby 文件上将树转换为 Ruby 3.3。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rewriting-the -ruby-parser" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310130" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：重新发送 (YC W23) – 电子邮件面向使用 React 的开发人员的 API</stitle>; <id>;https://resend.com</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T12:28:08.222089Z</updated>; <link href="https://resend .com"/>; <author>; <name>;zenorocha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zenorocha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://resend.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Flanding-page%2Fbghero.png&w=2048&q=75" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Resend 是一个面向开发人员的电子邮件 API，它提供可靠且易于使用的电子邮件发送解决方案。它提供诸如多区域支持和专用 IP 等功能以提高送达率。< href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-resend-yc-w23-email-api-for-developers-using-react" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36309120" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;文本编辑器数据结构</stitle>; <id>;https://cdacamar.github.io/data%20structures/algorithms/benchmarking /text%20editors/c++/editor-data-structures/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T16:28:08.222468Z</更新>; <link href="https://cdacamar.github.io/data %20structures/algorithms/benchmarking/text%20editors/c++/editor-data-structures/"/>; <author>; <name>;starfreakclone</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= starfreakclone</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdacamar.github.io/images/rope-1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 245px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了文本编辑器编程的挑战以及作者改造自己编辑器内部数据结构的旅程。他们探索了各种数据结构，包括巨型字符串、间隙缓冲区和绳索，最终定下了一块表数据结构。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#text-editor-data-structures" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312488" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C 中的一个简单哈希表</stitle>; <id>;https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/ </id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:28:08.222859Z</updated>; <link href="https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章解释了如何实现一个简单的哈希表在 C 中，包括散列函数、指针和内存段的使用。它还讨论了哈希表背后的设计决策及其性能特征。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-simple-hash-table-in-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36302552" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fishfuzz：用更大的网捕捉更深层次的错误 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://nebelwelt.net/publications/files/23SEC5.pdf</id >; <更新>;2023-06-14T01:28:08.223354Z</更新>; <link href="https://nebelwelt.net/publications/files/23SEC5.pdf"/>; <作者>; <name>;luu</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;FISHFUZZ 是一种新的灰盒模糊器输入优先级策略，它使用多- 距离度量、动态目标排名和智能队列剔除算法，将种子优先投放到感兴趣的位置，实现更全面的程序测试。它在覆盖率和错误发现方面优于现代定向灰盒模糊器和最先进的覆盖引导模糊器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fishfuzz-catch-deeper-bugs-by-throwing-larger-nets-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自学计算机科学功能</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /functionalcs.github.io/curriculum/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T16:28:08.223777Z</更新>; <link href="https://functionalcs.github.io/curriculum/"/>; <author>; <name>;ggr2342</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ggr2342</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文为合集为对理论感兴趣的人提供有关各种计算机科学主题的资源，以及有关学习策略的建议以及书籍和课程的建议。作者强调了每天投入时间学习和接受略高于个人技能水平的挑战的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teach-yourself-computer-science-functionally" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36312603" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Track HN：Show HN Stories 的存活率</stitle>; <id>;https://nami.land/2023/06/11/track-hn-analyze-survival-rate -of-120-396-show-hn-posts-june-2023.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T17:28:08.224152Z</更新>; <link href="https://nami. land/2023/06/11/track-hn-analyze-survival-rate-of-120-396-show-hn-posts-june-2023.html"/>; <author>; <name>;namiwang</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=namiwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nami.land/assets/thn/ 2306/Show%20HN%20submitted%20by%20year.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：140px；" />;<br />;剧透警告：许多好的项目都没有幸存下来 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#track-hn-survival-rate-of-show-hn-stories" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313562" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 翻倍</stitle>; <id>;https://www .platformer.news/p/reddit-doubles-down</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T01:28:08.224519Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.platformer.news/p/ reddit-doubles-down"/>; <author>; <name>;stanislavb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stanislavb</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws。 com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fd9da2f5e-b12a-42a0-a0c3-5d91c9f56a77_3543x2362.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;Reddit 正面临其用户群的反抗，因为计划向开发人员收取费用以使用该公司以前免费的 API，这可能会使审核工具、以可访问性为重点的应用程序和其他网络增强功能面临风险。 CEO Steve Huffman 已明确表示公司不打算做出任何让步，但已关闭的 subreddits 数量已从 7,000 左右增加到 8,400 多个，数百个社区的版主现在表示他们将延长停电时间无限期地超出其计划的两天。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-doubles-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36319652" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;高利率能解决高通胀吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lynalden.com/inflation-vs-interest-rates/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -13T20:28:08.225155Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lynalden.com/inflation-vs-interest-rates/"/>; <author>; <name>;fuoqi</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fuoqi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.lynalden.com/wp-content /uploads/inflation-interest-rates-feature.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：95px；" />;<br />;这篇文章探讨了通货膨胀的原因以及中央银行如何通过其政策，特别是通过利率来影响通货膨胀。它还强调了货币创造的不同来源，例如财政赤字和银行贷款，以及它们如何以不同方式促进通货膨胀。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#do-high-interest-rates-fix-high-inflation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315608" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Instant Brands，Instant Pot 和 Pyrex 炊具制造商申请破产</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cbc.ca/news/business/ instant-brands-bankruptcy-1.6874487</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T15:28:08.225581Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.cbc.ca/news/business/instant-brands -bankruptcy-1.6874487"/>; <author>; <name>;colinprince</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=colinprince</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://i.cbc.ca/1.3950688.1686669682!/fileImage/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/16x9_780/robert-wang.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px ;" />;<br />;Instant Brands 是 Pyrex 和 Instant Pot 等厨房必需品背后的公司，由于难以控制的债务负担，已申请破产。该公司账面上有价值 5.63 亿美元的债务，近年来销售额有所下降。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#instant-brands-maker-of-instant-pot-and-pyrex-cookware-files-for-bankruptcy" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310733" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Elixir 的“设置理论类型系统”原型/演示/展示</stitle>; <id>;https://typex. fly.dev</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T23:28:08.225978Z</updated>; <link href="https://typex.fly.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;天气之光</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=weatherlight</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了 Elixir 的集合理论类型系统的原型类型检查器，它旨在对一些示例进行类型检查，尚未反映 Elixir 类型的最终形式。原型依赖于第三方语言，并且具有类型注释的语法，如 function_name :: (type) over function definitions。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-s-set-theoretical-type-system-prototype-demo-showcase" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36299214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：在浏览器中运行的 LLaMA 分词器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js </id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:28:08.226384Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js"/>; <作者>; <名称>; belladoreai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belladoreai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph. githubassets.com/d48a1d58f2b4639db064f3d6ba09112d060cb24beff1e4c07afecddc3cbaaa92/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文介绍了 LLaMA 的第一个 JavaScript 分词器，它在浏览器和 Node 中运行，具有优化的运行时间和包大小。它还将其与 Web 应用程序中使用的其他流行分词器进行了比较，并解释了 LLaMA 模型的兼容性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-llama-tokenizer-that-runs-in-browser" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316489" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Obsidian-Copilot：写作和思考的原型助手</stitle>; <id>;https://eugeneyan.com/writing/obsidian-copilot/< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T15:28:08.226915Z</updated>; <link href="https://eugeneyan.com/writing/obsidian-copilot/"/>; <author>; <name>;alexmolas< /名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alexmolas</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://eugeneyan.com/ assets/og_image/copilot-og.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;这篇文章描述了名为 Obsidian-Copilot 的原型助手的开发，它通过起草段落和反思过去的日记条目来帮助写作和思考。它使用检索增强生成和 OpenSearch 以及语义索引进行检索。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#obsidian-copilot-a-prototype-assistant-for-writing-and-thinking" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310689" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;BuildZoom (YC W13) 正在招聘一名增长助理</stitle>; <id>;https://jobs.lever.co/buildzoom</id >; <updated>;2023-06-13T17:28:08.227455Z</updated>; <link href="https://jobs.lever.co/buildzoom"/>; <content type="html">;项目工程师（预建设）亚利桑那州斯科茨代尔或德克萨斯州休斯顿 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#buildzoom-yc-w13-is-hiring-a-growth-associate" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;私募股权正在从兽医办公室购买一切科技集团</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/23758492/private-equity-brendan-ballou-plunder-finance-doj</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T18:28: 08.227819Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/23758492/private-equity-brendan-ballou-plunder-finance-doj"/>; <author>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn .com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x2400/filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24722142/236699_Decoder_Brendan_Ballou_WJoel.jpg “样式=”宽度： 220像素； height: 220px;" />;<br />;私募股权公司收集现金，筹集投资者现金，并举债购买公司，通常将它们从公开股票市场撤出。然后他们任命新的管理层并开始积极削减成本和周转计划，目标是出售公司或再次上市以获利。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#private-equity-is-buying-everything-from-vet- offices-to-tech-conglomerates" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313967" target="_blank">;[comments ]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;单声道漫画</stitle>; < id>;https://dtinth.github.io/comic-mono-font/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T16:28:08.228183Z</更新>; <link href="https://dtinth. github.io/comic-mono-font/"/>; <author>; <name>;lolinder</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lolinder</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/164606802/cd83d680-894c-11e9-83f7-c353c70df1cb" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文介绍了一种清晰的等宽字体，它是 Shannon Miwa 的 Comic Shanns（版本 1）的一个分支。字体系列是通过使用 Python 脚本修补原始字体创建的，可以使用在网页中包含样式表。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#comic-mono" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312200" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jim Keller 谈 AI、RISC-V、Tenstorrent 向边缘 IP 的转变</stitle>; <id>;https://www.eetimes.com/jim-keller-on- ai-risc-v-tenstorrents-move-to-edge-ip/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T14:28:08.228546Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.eetimes. com/jim-keller-on-ai-risc-v-tenstorrents-move-to-edge-ip/"/>; <author>; <name>;JoachimS</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=JoachimS</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.eetimes.com/wp-content/uploads/shutterstock_2121044741.jpg?w=300 " style="宽度: 220px; height: 118px;" />;<br />;传奇CPU设计师Jim Keller出任AI芯片公司Tenstorrent CEO，是开源ISA RISC-V的坚定支持者，Tenstorrent近期已授权其AI加速器核心IP和 CPU 核心 IP 给 LG 电子，用于智能电视和汽车芯片。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jim-keller-on-ai-risc-v-tenstorrents-move-to- edge-ip" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310145" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;金属着色器转换器和缺失的设备范围屏障< /stitle>; <id>;https://raphlinus.github.io/gpu/2023/06/12/shader-converter.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:28:08.228972Z</更新>; <link href="https://raphlinus.github.io/gpu/2023/06/12/shader-converter.html"/>; <author>; <name>;raphlinus</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=raphlinus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Apple introduced a Metal shader converter tool for converting shaders from DXIL to Metal, but the lack of support for atomic barriers in Metal holds back WebGPU's performance and adds complexity to the GPU ecosystem. The author recommends focusing on a solid, spec-compliant foundation for GPU compute and cheering on the work of Asahi Linux in implementing Vulkan on Apple Silicon. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#metal-shader-converter-and-the-missing-device-scoped-barrier" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36298798" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Screwing up my page tables</stitle>; <id>;https://axleos.com/screwing-up-my-page-tables/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T21:28:08.229340Z</updated>; <link href="https://axleos.com/screwing-up-my-page-tables/"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://axleos.com/screwing-up-my-page-tables/new_pmm_design.png" style="width: 220px; height: 83px;" />;<br />;The author describes their experience with debugging memory bugs in kernel-space while rewriting a network stack in Rust, and how changing the frame allocation strategy caused low-level memory bugs to surface. They eventually discover that their paging structures were being overwritten due to incorrect memory accesses. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#screwing-up-my-page-tables" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36306948" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
